title: Camera violently shaking
content:
Hi around 80% of the time I open up any app that requires the front facing cameras, I get a high static sound and a very blurry picture. I've found a video that shows exactly what I'm experiencing. I've had this phone for a few months but have only started experience this in the last few weeks. Thanks in advance 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TWz-xWAtZ0M
